text.name: system_description
text.text: The Philips VG-5000 μ (sometimes written also VG5K) is an 8-bit home computer, produced by the French Radiotechnique company (RTS), and marketed by Philips, Radiola and Schneider from 1984 until 1986. Despite having a name similar to the Philips VG-8000, it is not compatible with the MSX standard and works only with software owners.
